/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a panoramic view of the street below. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and continuity. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few wispy clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
